content.rendered:
Directed by Luv Ranjan

Written by Rahul Mody. Luv Ranjan. Luv Ranjan

Cast Kartik Aaryan (Sonu Sharma). Nushrratt Bharuccha (Sweety Sharma (as Nushrat Bharucha)). Sunny Singh (Titu Sharma). Alok Nath (Ghasitaram – Titu’s Grandfather). Madhumalti Kapoor (Rukmani – Titu’s Grandmother). Ishita Raj (Pihu Khanna). Pawan Chopra (Titu’s Father). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Titu’s Mother). Deepika Amin (Sweety’s Mother). Rajesh Jais (Sweety’s Father). Veerendra Saxena (Lalu Kaka (as Virendra Saxena)). Priitamm Jaiswal (Babu (as Pritam Jaiswal)). Priyanka Bhole (Shalu – Sweety’s Cousin). Monica Kohli (Sweety’s Bua). Sakshi Malik (Girl 1 at House Party). Gulsanam (Girl 2 at House Party). Ri Djavi Alexandra (Girl 3 at House Party (as Alexandra)). Shibesh Debnath (Babbu – Titu’s Shop Assistant). Ashwinder Jandu Singh (Sonu’s Assistant). Vicky Sidana (Panditji). Pavitra Mattoo (Girl at India Gate). Sonnalli Seygall (Sonu’s Girlfriend). Akshit Shetty (Anshul – Pihu’s Collegaue). Digvijay Singh Gurbat (Sweety’s Ex-Fiance (as Digvijay Singh)). Vikash Mishra (Yuvraj). Rahul Mody (Vivaah Executive). Nigam Thakur (Male Househelp). Shatakshi Gupta (Female Househelp) . Mukesh S. Bhatt (Estate Agent (as Mukesh Bhatt)). Anjum Gulati (Catering Guy at Wedding). Dhananjay Kapoor (Bride’s Father). Paras Kumar (Worker). Sunita Kushalani (Bride’s Grandmother). Saniya Nagdev (Bride’s Mother). Katrina Ross (Jaz). Harsh Shashwat (Digital partner)

Languages Hindi

Producers Inderjit Chadha. Hanif Chunawala. Hemant Kumar Dixit. Ankur Garg. Hetvi Karia. Ashish Kathpal. Mahesh Korade. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Naren Kumar. Ilia Matiashvili. Sanjay Mehta. Luv Ranjan. Ravi Sarin. Mohd Islam Shaikh. Manoj Srivastava

Production T-Serie. Luv Film. Sarke Studio
